Possibility of a Hidden Camera in changing room is almost 20%. 

Scan for devices listed below: 

1. Mirror - Precaution: Touch the mirror. Do you feel any gap between your finger and its reflection? if NO, there could be a hidden camera behind the mirror glass. Report Immediately or change the room. 

2. Hanger - Check for lens looking aperture for hanger specially screw looking objects. Put cloths covering all screws. 

3. Ceiling/Smoke Detector - Precaution: Apply sticker/tape over the viewable part of the detector.
